channel.title: Service Enumeration :: HackForge
channel.description: General Service Enumeration Nmap Service Discovery Detect service versions nmap -sV $ip Aggressive version detection nmap -sV --version-all $ip Scan all ports and detect services nmap -p- -sV $ip Run default scripts for enumeration nmap -sC -sV $ip

item.title: Domain Name System (DNS)
item.description: Nmap DNS Enumeration Brute-force subdomains nmap -p 53 --script dns-brute $ip Extract name server details nmap -p 53 --script dns-nsid $ip Comprehensive scripts nmap -n --script "(default and *dns*) or fcrdns or dns-srv-enum or dns-random-txid or dns-random-srcport" $ip Manual DNS Enumeration General Get all available DNS records dig $ip ANY Perform DNS lookup host -a $ip Retrieve all DNS records nslookup -query=ANY $ip Regular DNS request dig ANY @$ip $domain IPv6 DNS request
